manifest_description.message: Hides the length and title of videos on Twitch.tv to prevent spoilers when watching sports or esports.

playerShowHideDuration_visible.description: Label of the Show/Hide Duration button for the visible state.

playerShowHideDuration_hidden.description: Label of the Show/Hide Duration button for the hidden state.

playerJumpBackward.description: Label of the Jump Backward button.

playerJumpForward.description: Label of the Jump Forward button.

playerJump_errMsg.message: Jump distance format: "2" for 2 minutes or "1h2m3s" for 1 hour, 2 minutes and 3 seconds
playerJump_errMsg.description: The error message to be displayed the jump distance is invalid.

options_general.description: Label of the General options section.

options_player.description: Label of the Player options section.

options_player_hideDuration.description: Label of the Player: Hide Duration option.

options_player_jumpDistance.description: Label of the Player: Jump Distance option.

options_player_theatreMode.description: Label of the Player: Theatre Mode option.

options_videoList.description: Label of the Video List options section.

options_videoList_hideDuration.description: Label of the Video List: Hide Duration option.

options_videoList_hideTitle.description: Label of the Video List: Hide Title option.

options_twitch.description: Label of the Twitch options section.

options_save_successMsg.description: Message to be displayed after a successful Save action.

options_restoreDefaults.description: Label of the Restore Defaults button.

options_restoreDefaults_successMsg.description: Message to be displayed after a successful Restore Defaults action.
